This restaurant was around the corner from our hotel, and came highly recommended from the hotel staff.  Thank goodness we followed their advice!  Such a cute little place- casual but elegant decor.  There is minimal seating for an intimate feel, tables can be hard to come by but worth the wait.  We ordered a variety of tapas and loved everything- I particularly enjoyed the tuna tartar.  The wine was also excellent.  Staff was great and were very helpful with recommendations for food and drink.  This restaurant is located close to the Arc de Triomfe.
